text:
The big question is do you/we
who know better use ISO date format? Make a point of using only that every place
possible. The more people who use it, the more chances for those who don't to
recognize the benefits and decide to use it themselves. I'm heartened because
it's starting to catch on in my workplace. On Thursday, October 26, 2023 at
17:42, Steve Smalley eloquently inscribed:
Link: None
